basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm a 34 year old developer from Mumbai.  Being in the aviation industry for the past 15 years , I have  been lucky to enjoy my passion and make a comfortable living doing it , I felt it was time to expand my horizons into my other passion which is tech, and thus I decided to join code fellows.I know ,due to my past experiences that have ingrained perseverance commitment and honesty ; professional skills such as time management , on time performance ,a client centric approach and professional discipline, along with the requisite soft skills needed to be part of a team, using adequate resource management;  I will be an asset to all my future employers , mentors and colleagues.

section_name.about: Professional Software Developer with an eye for detail.

projects.title: Magic City
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. We did this project as our 201 final project. Application was created keeping entertainment in the time of covid in mind

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for creating an application that takes in dynamic iterations of shops seling cookies in various cities and keeping track of sales :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
